list_definition.definition: a person who looks after archives

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She is Chief Archivist at the John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum.

list_ex_of_english: What is surprising is not only the quantity and variety of his activities but also his meticulousness as an archivist.
The archivists there also provided information regarding other research using the documents in the collection.
Such is the appeal of having your very own archivist.
During this time he remade himself into an archivist, a gatherer of historical facts.
It is one which other ecclesiastical archivists can only be exhorted to follow.
An archivist normally does not ask this major question.
The author would like to thank all of the archivists who have guided him through these collections.
In theory, archives are best made by archivists, who have a dispassionate relationship with their data and a methodologically correct approach to its organisation.
